item.description: Our afternoon begins at the Clarion Hotel at Nantasket Beach. Spend your time at the beach in the sun or stay in our reserved room on our balcony sipping cosmos or enjoying wine. After a relaxing afternoon, (check out their spa services) we get ready for a wonderful dinner in their ocean front dining room. Dinner costs are on your own - there's a $35 pp charge for the room reservation, cocktails, and summertime appertisers. Join us for this special summer event.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Nantasket Day At The Beach, Cocktails and Dinner
